Text: Also, EVP Andy F. Bessette sold 11,650 shares of Travelers Companies stock in a transaction that occurred on Tuesday, August 20th. The shares were sold at an average price of $146.85, for a total transaction of $1,710,802.50. Following the completion of the transaction, the executive vice president now directly owns 21,259 shares in the company, valued at approximately $3,121,884.15.
